name: stashit
title: stashit
description: Collect files, text, and images via Raycast and drop them later anywhere
author: akshat202002

commands.name: add-to-stack
commands.title: Add to Stack
commands.description: Add selected Finder files or clipboard items to stack (Dropover-style)

commands.name: copy-stack-to-clipboard
commands.title: Drop Stack
commands.description: Copy all files to clipboard - paste anywhere with âŒ˜V (Dropover-style)

commands.name: clear-stack
commands.title: Clear Stack
commands.description: Clear all items from the stack

preferences.name: autoClearOnDrop
preferences.title: Auto-clear Stack
preferences.label: Automatically clear stack after dropping
preferences.description: When enabled, the stack will be automatically cleared after using 'Drop All Stack'

preferences.name: closeWindowOnDrop
preferences.title: Close Window on Drop
preferences.label: Automatically close Raycast window after dropping
preferences.description: When enabled, Raycast will close automatically after dropping files

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
